extension.name: Custom Carousel Pro
extension.author: Istopan
extension.description:
by Istopan

CUSTOMIZE EACH CAROUSEL WITH EDITOR AND PLUGINS

More information at http://www.istopan.gr

field.name: cwidth
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of carousel box px or % e.g. 100px

field.name: cheight
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of carousel box px or % e.g. 200px

field.name: tposition
field.label: Top Position
field.description: Position from Top of The Module px or % e.g. 30px

field.name: cbgnd
field.label: Background
field.description: Carousel background color selection, default is none

field.name: cborder
field.label: Carousel Border
field.description: Border for Carousel e.g. none or 1px solid #eee

field.name: cjsloaders
field.label: Loader
field.description: Slider loader Enable / Disable. Note: Use Loader for Large carousels and disable loader on all other carousel if you ue multiple itance of the module.

field.name: lbbgimgs
field.label: Loader Background Image
field.description: Loader background image. Images must be located to IMAGES folder e.g. image.jpg

field.name: lbprcnts
field.label: Percent
field.description: Enable / Disable Show percent of loading progress

field.name: lbprcntszs
field.label: Percent font
field.description: Font size for percent number e.g. 50px

field.name: cnback
field.label: Nav Bar Background
field.description: Nav bar background color selection, default is none

field.name: cnbalign
field.label: Nav Bar buttons align
field.description: Select an option for Nav Bar buttons align position

field.name: cntop
field.label: Nav Bar Top
field.description: Position from Top of The Module px or % e.g. 30px or 50%

field.name: cbfsize
field.label: Buttons Size
field.description: Size of prev and next buttons e.g. 20px

field.name: cblheight
field.label: Buttons line-height
field.description: line-height of prev and next buttons e.g. 15px

field.name: cbborder
field.label: Buttons border
field.description: border of prev and next buttons e.g. 1px solid #000 or none

field.name: clbfloat
field.label: Left button float
field.description: float position for left button. select none, left and right

field.name: crbfloat
field.label: Right button float
field.description: float position for right button. select none, left and right

field.name: carfsc
field.label: Full Screen
field.description: Fullscreen Slider, useful for frontpage sliders.

field.name: cjsloader
field.label: Loader
field.description: Slider loader Enable / Disable. Note: Use Loader for Large carousels and disable loader on all other carousel if you ue multiple itance of the module.

field.name: lbbgimg
field.label: Loader Background Image
field.description: Loader background image. Images must be located to IMAGES folder e.g. image.jpg

field.name: lbprcnt
field.label: Percent
field.description: Enable / Disable Show percent of loading progress

field.name: lbprcntsz
field.label: Percent
field.description: Font size for percent number e.g. 50px

field.name: cjsborder
field.label: Carousel Border
field.description: Border for Carousel e.g. none or 1px solid #eee

field.name: cmskpd
field.label: Padding
field.description: Carousel or Mask or Text Padding. It depends if mask enabled and text position. e.g. 2px 2px 10px or 10px or 20px 0px

field.name: cbspeed
field.label: Speed
field.description: Speed between slide transitions miliseconds. e.g. 1000

field.name: cbdelay
field.label: Delay
field.description: Delay time until next slide miliseconds. e.g. 6000

field.name: jsphover
field.label: Pause on Hover
field.description: Pause on mouse hover yes or no

field.name: jsnav
field.label: Navigation
field.description: Enable navigation buttons yes or no

field.name: cbfsize
field.label: Buttons Size
field.description: Size of prev and next buttons e.g. 20px

field.name: cblheight
field.label: Buttons line-height
field.description: line-height of prev and next buttons e.g. 15px

field.name: cbborder
field.label: Buttons border
field.description: border of prev and next buttons e.g. 1px solid #000 or none

field.name: tbposition
field.label: Button Top Position
field.description: Buttons Position from Top of The Module px or % e.g. 50%

field.name: cpgwidth
field.label: Pagination Width
field.description: Width of pagination dots px or % e.g. 15px

field.name: cmskwd
field.label: Mask or Text Width
field.description: Mask or Text width px or %

field.name: cmskhg
field.label: Mask or Text Height
field.description: Mask or Text height px or %

field.name: cmskpt
field.label: Top Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the top px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskpb
field.label: Bottom Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the bottom px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskpr
field.label: Right Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the right side px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskpl
field.label: Left Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the left side px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskbr
field.label: Mask Radius
field.description: Radius for Mask px or % e.g. 10px or 20%

field.name: cbxborder
field.label: Carousel Border
field.description: Border for Carousel e.g. none or 1px solid #eee

field.name: cmskpdbx
field.label: Padding
field.description: Carousel or Mask or Text Padding. It depends if mask enabled and text position. e.g. 2px 2px 10px or 10px or 20px 0px

field.name: jsrandombx
field.label: Random
field.description: Dynamically adjust slider height based on each slide's height

field.name: bxmode
field.label: Mode
field.description: Type of transition between slides, horizontal, vertical or fade

field.name: bxauto
field.label: Auto
field.description: Auto Start. Slides will automatically transition.

field.name: bxpause
field.label: Pause - Delay
field.description: The amount of time (in ms) between each auto transition

field.name: bxautodir
field.label: Direction
field.description: The direction of auto show slide transitions.

field.name: bxautohov
field.label: Auto Hover
field.description: Auto show will pause when mouse hovers over slider.

field.name: bxautodl
field.label: Auto Delay
field.description: Time (in ms) auto show should wait before starting. e.g 0

field.name: bxminsl
field.label: Min Slides
field.description: The minimum number of slides to be shown. Slides will be sized down if carousel becomes smaller than the original size.

field.name: bxmaxsl
field.label: Max Slides
field.description: The maximum number of slides to be shown. Slides will be sized up if carousel becomes larger than the original size.

field.name: bxmovesl
field.label: Move Slides
field.description: The number of slides to move on transition. This value must be bigger or equal minSlides, and smaller or equal maxSlides. If zero (default), the number of fully-visible slides will be used.

field.name: bxslwidth
field.label: Slide Width
field.description: The width of each slide. This setting is required for all horizontal carousels! e.g. 0 or 300 or 5000

field.name: bxinfloop
field.label: Infinite Loop
field.description: If Yes, clicking Next while on the last slide will transition to the first slide and vice-versa

field.name: jqueryeas
field.label: Easing
field.description: jQuery Easing transition effects Enable / Disable

field.name: bxeasing
field.label: Easing Effect
field.description: The type of easing to use during transitions. swing or linear

field.name: bxcticker
field.label: Ticker
field.description: Use slider in ticker mode (similar to a news ticker).

field.name: bxctickhr
field.label: Ticker Hover
field.description: Ticker will pause when mouse hovers over slider. Note: this functionality does NOT work if using CSS transitions!

field.name: bxadheight
field.label: Adaptive Height
field.description: Dynamically adjust slider height based on each slide's height *only for Images not backgrounds

field.name: bxadhspeed
field.label: Adaptive Height Speed
field.description: Slide height transition duration (in ms). Note: only used if adaptiveHeight: true, Integer e.g. 500 *only for Images not backgrounds

field.name: bxresp
field.label: Responsive
field.description: Enable or disable auto resize of the slider. Useful if you need to use fixed width sliders.

field.name: bxploadimg
field.label: Preload Images
field.description: If 'all', preloads all images before starting the slider. If 'visible', preloads only images in the initially visible slides before starting the slider (tip: use 'visible' if all slides are identical dimensions). Works only on images

field.name: bxtouch
field.label: Touch
field.description: Enable or disable Touch. If Yes, slider will allow touch swipe transitions.

field.name: bxkeyb
field.label: Keyboard
field.description: Enable or disable Keyboard. If Yes, keyboard can be used for carousel navigation.

field.name: cmskwdbx
field.label: Mask or Text Width
field.description: Mask or Text width px or %

field.name: cmskhgbx
field.label: Mask or Text Height
field.description: Mask or Text height px or %

field.name: cmskptbx
field.label: Top Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the top px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskpbbx
field.label: Bottom Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the bottom px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskprbx
field.label: Right Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the right side px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskplbx
field.label: Left Mask or Text Position
field.description: Mask or Text position from the left side px or % e.g. 10px *This affects the positioning of the contents within the slide

field.name: cmskbrbx
field.label: Mask Radius
field.description: Radius for Mask px or % e.g. 10px or 20%

field.name: bxpager
field.label: Pager
field.description: Enable / Disable Pager. If Yes, Next / Prev controls will be added

field.name: bxpagertp
field.label: Pager Type
field.description: If 'full', a pager link will be generated for each slide. If 'short', a x / y pager will be used (ex. 1 / 5)

field.name: bxpagertps
field.label: Pager Short Separator
field.description: If pager Type: 'short', pager will use this value as the separating character.

field.name: bxpgwd
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of pager bullets e.g. 10 (without px). Note: if you want bullets to be circle width, height and border radius must be equal

field.name: bxpgrad
field.label: Radius
field.description: Radius of pager bullets e.g. 10 (without px). Note: if you want bullets to be circle width, height and border radius must be equal

field.name: bxpghg
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of pager bullets e.g. 10 (without px). Note: if you want bullets to be circle width, height and border radius must be equal

field.name: bxpgmrg
field.label: Margin
field.description: Margin of pager bullets e.g. 0 5px or 10px.

field.name: bxcontrols
field.label: Controls
field.description: Enable / Disable Controls. If Yes, Next / Prev controls will be added

field.name: bxnavtop
field.label: Position
field.description: Navigation buttons position from top px 0r %. e.g. 50% or 200px

field.name: bxnext
field.label: Next Button
field.description: Text to be used for the Next button control

field.name: bxprev
field.label: Prev Button
field.description: Text to be used for the Prev button control

field.name: cc1bgimg
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Carousel 1 background image. Images must be located to IMAGES folder e.g. image.jpg

field.name: cc1bgpos
field.label: Background Position
field.description: e.g. left top, left center, left bottom, right top, right center, right bottom, center top, center center, center bottom or 100% 50%

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: cccode
field.label: Custom Css
field.description: Here you can use CSS code
